AGHOL.IS.summary: AG Anadolu Grubu Holding A.S., through its subsidiaries, engages in the beer, soft drinks, automotive, retailing, and other businesses in Turkey and internationally. The company produces and sells beer and malt, and carbonated and non-carbonated beverages, as well as passenger and commercial vehicles; imports, distributes, markets, and rents motor vehicles; and offers generators, and spares and component parts. It is also involved in the production of industrial engines; sale of tractors; production of writing instruments; distribution of other imported stationery products; arrangement of travelling and organization facilities; and provision of IT, internet, and e-commerce services. In addition, the company engages in the restaurant management; whole sale and retail sale of electricity; insurance agency; and production, distribution, and transmission of electricity businesses. Further, it purchases, sells, rents, and manages real estate properties; leases intellectual property; fills and sells natural spring water; and offers tourism services. The company was formerly known as Yazicilar Holding A.S. and changed its name to AG Anadolu Grubu Holding A.S. in December 2017. AG Anadolu Grubu Holding A.S. was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

CCOLA.IS.summary: Coca-Cola IÃ§ecek Anonim Sirketi, together with its subsidiaries, engages in bottling and distributing alcohol-free beverages primarily in Turkey, Jordan, Kazakhstan, Azerbaijan, Pakistan, Kyrgyzstan, Turkmenistan, Iraq, Syria, and Tajikistan. The company is involved in the production, distribution, and sale of sparkling and still beverages under the Coca-Cola, Coca-Cola Zero, Coca-Cola Zero Sugar, Coca-Cola Light, Fanta, Sprite, Cappy, Sen Sun, Powerade, Monster, Burn, Gladiator, and Fuse tea brand names, as well as Schweppes brand name. Its product portfolio also include juices, water, sports and energy drinks, tea, and iced tea. In addition, the company engages in the production and filling of natural spring water under the Damla name. Further, the company sells its products online. The company was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Coca-Cola IÃ§ecek Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of Anadolu Efes Biracilik ve Malt Sanayi A.S.

KRSTL.IS.long_name: Kristal Kola ve Mesrubat Sanayi Ticaret A.S.
KRSTL.IS.summary: Kristal Kola ve Mesrubat Sanayi Ticaret A.S. produces and sells soft drinks in Turkey and internationally. It offers carbonated, non-carbonated, and energy drinks; and mineral and spring water products. The company distributes and markets its products through distributor companies and dealers under the Kristal COLA, CHAT COLA, RED LINE, Kristal, and Balsa brand names. Kristal Kola ve Mesrubat Sanayi Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1994 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

PINSU.IS.long_name: Pinar Su ve Icecek Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
PINSU.IS.summary: Pinar Su ve Icecek Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells bottled water, pet bottle, carbonated and noncarbonated beverage, and fruit beverage under the Pinar Yasam Pinarim brand name in Turkey. It also exports its products to United Kingdom, Germany, the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus, Iraq, Kuwait, the United Arab Emirates, Azerbaijan, Bahrain, Romania, Ireland, Libya, Singapore, Malta, Kosovo, Trinidad Tobago, Switzerland, the United States, Ukraine, and Belgium. The company was formerly known as Pinar Su Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. and changed its name to Pinar Su ve Icecek Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. in April 2019. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey. Pinar Su ve Icecek Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Yasar Holding A.S.
